translations: 女权主义，男女平等主义；女权运动

sentences.sentence: "Not all feminism has to be like this," Jo maintains.
sentences.translation: 乔坚持认为，“并非所有的女权运动都得像这样。”

sentences.sentence: Once we get to feminism, feminism will have certain ideas of its own about the vertical axis.
sentences.translation: 当我们谈到女性主义时，女性主义都会对竖轴有自己的解读。
